modName: PS ColorThatArmors Vanilla Male - Skimpy 7b Female Variations
summary: Non smithing menu cluttering - runtime interchangeable color variations of vanilla male and 7base sexy vanilla (and I love cleavage) armors
descriptionHtml:
[center] [heading] [color=yellow] ------------ YOU MUST READ THIS -------------- [/color]

-2) Each armor comes with 12 color variations (Original NOT included)

-1.5) This MOD will NOT clutter your smithing menu NOR replace your original color

-1) You can CHANGE COLOR DURING the GAME

0) The color variation comes both for MALE and FEMALE !!!!

1) These armors are all STANDALONE - Craft the "PCTA0" armor OR convert it from the base

2) Anything other than "PCTA0" armor MUST BE CONVERTED with MAGIC
(Or you can always cheat using a console)

3) You MUST DOWNLOAD and INSTALL SKSE and "PS CTA Change Spell" to convert and switch armors

[color=yellow] ------------ MUST READS ENDS HERE --------------[/color] [/center] [/heading]

[heading] [color=yellow] Requirements [/color] [/heading]
- Skyrim Script Extender (if you don't want to type everything through a console that is)
- 12 Gb of HDD space (HDD's are cheap - Try making symbolic lnks "cmd" -> "mklink" if your SSD is getting too crowded)
- How to make symbolic link
1) Extract files in a desired location somewhere
2) Start - Search bar : cmd - Right click and choose "Run as Administrator"
3) Go to Skyrim data mesh directory : "cd ...meshes"
4) Make link : "mklink /d EXTRACTED_PCTA_MESH_DIRECTORY"
5) Repeat same for texture directory

[heading] [color=yellow] Vanilla Armors that Have been Converted [/color] [/heading]
- Hide
- Leather
- Fur
- Iron
- Scaled
- Steel
- Steel plate
- Blades
- Elven
- Ebony
- Dragon(scale and plate)
- Daedric
- Orcish
- Forsworn
*** And many others that slipped through the crack since most are SkyProc generated and ImageMagick processed

[heading] [color=yellow] Usage [/color] [/heading]
[color=yellow] - Getting the colored "PCTA ##" armors [/color]
1) Craft it from the smithing menu (***You can only craft PCTA 0***)
2) Equip armors you want to convert on PC or NPC then, convert it with "PS CTA Change spells" (*** Must set the switch increment to "Convert" mode *** See below)
[img] http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53925-4-1399751746.jpg [/img]

[color=yellow] - Switching colors of PCTA armors (OR convert between PCTA0 and original) [/color]
*** Each spell comes with "Forward" and "Reverse" which controls the direction of change
*** ONLY equipped armors that are selected in settings will switch colors
- Player Character : Use "PS CTA Color Change SELF ---" powers
[img] http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53925-2-1399751746.jpg [/img]
- NPC : Use "PS CTA Color Change TARGET ---" alteration spells
[img] http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53925-1-1399751745.jpg [/img]

[color=yellow] - Setting which armor pieces to change and/or by how much [/color]
- Use "PS CTA Color Change Setting" powers for BOTH PC and NPC
[img] http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53925-1-1399751901.jpg [/img]

[heading] [color=yellow] Tools Used [/color] [/heading]
- SkyProc
- ImageMagick

[heading] [color=yellow] Female Armor Credits [/color] [/heading]
- Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP by Crosscrusade
- I Love Cleavage CBBE HDT by Bartolo71

[heading] [color=yellow] My Old Mods [/color] [/heading]

Really useful quick tool for body testing and prototyping
[img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/47791-1-1386525519.jpg [/img] [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/46823] - PS Customizable UNIQUE Combat Companions with In-Game Body Changer :
How can modder's mod collection be complete without follwers? All the models you see in here and from my pictures are these ladies
[img] http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/46823-1-1385185150.jpg [/img] [/url]



[heading] [color=yellow] Copyrights and Permissions [/color] [/heading]
Open source General Public Lincense. Do whatever you like with this (At this stage, I'll be even happy if someone can re-release it without my name and get more endorsements). No permission required.
author: oscarvonreuenthal
